short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disconnect tracker protection makes the web more private, secure, and faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disconnect blocks the invisible trackers that collect your online activity and expose you to malware and identity theft. We protect you from thousands of trackers and advanced privacy threats that hide on the websites you visit. Our tracker protection lists are the most comprehensive, up to date, and intelligent form of protection available.

Disconnect was named the best privacy tool several times by the New York Times, won the Innovation Award for Best Privacy and Security software at South by Southwest, was listed as one of the 100 best innovations of the year by Popular Science, and one of the best Chrome extensions by several software review websites.

Disconnect is pay-what-you-want software: https://disconnect.me/support.
